text: Shobha Nagi Reddy (16 November 1968 â€“ 24 April 2014) was an Indian politician from Andhra Pradesh, India. She represented Allagadda in the Legislative Assembly of Andhra Pradesh for four terms until 2012 when she resigned due to political scandals in her party. Reddy was born in Allagadda, Andhra Pradesh, India. Reddy died in Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh, India in a car crash. She was 45 years old. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh
title: Shobha Nagi Reddy
